root.name: Maia
root.description: OverviewMaia takes place in the year 2113 when the Humans decide to initiate it's first extra-solar colonization program classified as Maia. It is a management game whereupon you are required to build, expand and improve the said colony.Maia is currently in Alpha stage and is still under development.GameplayMuch like Dungeon Keeper and (and to a certain degree) Evil Genius, much of the view takes place underground the hostile surface of the planet. Expanding the colony means mining out the walls to create rooms and space where the inhabitants move about and work. Furthermore, it is up to the player to keep his inhabitants happy by providing the appropriate rooms and equipment to feed, house and entertain the colonists whilst protecting them from alien wildlife.FeaturesTaken from the website:Up to 2KM x 2KM x 2KM of procedural world.Complex Colonist A.I.Dark humourAAA Quality GraphicsWater and Lava simulationCellular atmosphereA simple minimalist U.I.Inspired by 1970's Sci-FiIntricate Defense SystemsBi-Polar AndroidsA First Person ModeOpen Data for ModdersSystem RequirementsIt will be available for both Windows and Linux operating systems. A Mac version will be available if there is a demand.Maia uses a custom build engine and will aim for high quality graphics without the need for a high spec computer.External LinksOfficial Site - Maiahttp://www.maiagame.com/index.php
